articles.author: Cory Weinberg, Michael Roddan
articles.title: Regulator That Haunted Fintechs Falls Under Trump Ax - The Information
articles.description: Two big fintechs, banking app Chime and “buy now, pay later” firm Klarna, are getting ready to go public. While they were primping and polishing, they got a pleasant surprise from Washington this week: The Donald Trump administration effectively shut down the…

articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: The Diablo hackers that debunked a record speedrun - Ars Technica
articles.description: Investigators decompiled the game to search through 2.2 billion random dungeon seeds.
